## ErrorXConfig interface

Configuration interface for ErrorX global settings

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface ErrorXConfig 
```

boolean \| string\[\]

_(Optional)_ Control stack trace cleaning behavior - true: Enable automatic stack trace cleaning (default) - false: Disable stack trace cleaning entirely - string\[\]: Custom patterns to match and remove from stack traces
